name: Bike Extreme Adventure 3D
description:
Extreme Bike Adventure 3D is a fun and exciting game. Enjoy real Bike Adventure here. Download for free. Take a thrilling Bike Adventure! Challenge the best rider!

Jump over obstacles, dodge flying bullet, you can also make a cute back flip. Collect coins, win diamonds, unlock and upgrade your props. Win high score and achieve great achievements. Challenge the best score on leaderboard. Take an adventure on city roads and achieve your world champion dream!

Features Highlight:
- Classic gameplay and easy to control
- 2 realistic scenes: City Road and Garden
- Magnificent graphics, vivid and smooth animation
- 3 customized characters with special skills, unlock and upgrade
- Realistic 3D visual effects, thrilling extreme experience
- 8 well-designed levels refresh your eyes, more levels coming soon

Ride your cool bike, be the cool kid! Show off your bike master skill! Now or never!
